find.any: Search, find any kind of related articles, tutorials, code, videos...
article.looking: What sort of Articles are You Looking for?
discover.articles: Find, discover and learn with Articles and examples sorted by categories.
discover.last: Discover the latest of Antic's Code
liked.why: Discover why these Articles are the most loved
user.says: This is what people says about Antic's Code
subscribe.sub: Subscribe to get update and information. Don't worry, we won't send spam!
name: Name
term.one: The use of this portal is completely free. You do not need an account to be able to see it's content.
term.two: With an account on your own, You will be able to interact with the portal, track your learning as You use it. You'll have access to your own profile which you can share to show others what you're made of.
term.three: Your data will be used exclusively for the use of this portal. In no case will it be given to third parties. Sensitive data such as passwords are encrypted, only you will have access to them.
term.four: Remember to maintain a healthy attitude when interacting with other users. We all want to learn. You can also teach something to others.
term.five: The content of the portal is strictly oriented to a technological audience of any level, especially focused on web development with Javacript. It is also a good place to learn from scratch some modern web technology.
welcome.code: Welcome to the code list. Here you will find all the code used on the articles of this portal. It's a
of.code: where you can find interesting things and learn something new.
code.intro: The code is randomly sorted to give the feeling that You see new code every time. Read the description to find out what the code is, find out about the level necessary to carry it out, that includes complexity, knowledge of the user and time of accomplishment.
code.final: Finally, the code is sorted by categories. Use the list to
user.name: Your Username
bio.not.defined: Not Defined. Write something about You
article.ready: Do You think the article is ready to be published?
remember.edit: Remember You can edit the article
no.published: You don't have any articles published
no.archived: You don't have any articles archived. You can create one
delete.account.p:
if you delete your account, your information that belongs to this portal will be erased, this includes your profile, your likes and article scores. This process cannot be undone.
Are you really sure you want to delete your account?
delete.sentence: I am sure to delete my account, go ahead.
label: Label
order.title: Sort by
sorry.results: We're sorry, your research does not match any of the criteria provided.

server.title: Server Error
server.message: There has been an internal error on the server. If the error continues, please try again later or contact us. Sorry for the disturbances.

web.title: Network Error
web.message: There seems to be a network error. Check that you have Internet access and try again. If the problem persists, contact us.

code.title: Code Error
code.message: Sorry, there was a runtime error in the code. Please try to refresh the page if the error continues, otherwise contact us. Sorry for the disturbances.

register.title: Already registered
register.message: If you really want to sign up for a new account other than the one you already have, please log out first and try again.

request.title: Data Error
request.message: There was an error verifying the data. Please check the entered data and try again. If the problem persists, contact us.

access.title: Access Error
access.message: Access to this service has been denied for preventing from an unknown origin. Sorry for the inconvenience, if the problem persists, contact us.

token.title: Acceso Expired
token.message: Your token to access Antic's Code has expired, but do not worry, we have updated it for you. You can continue using the page as always.

unknown.title: Unkown error
unknown.message: We don't know yet but something bad happened. Sorry for the inconvenience, if the problem persists, contact us.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.message: We are working on improving the page and some parts may not work properly. Sorry for the inconvenience, we continue to develop so that everything returns to normal as soon as possible. Thanks for your understanding.
